name: show
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool vizor_ads.
Tool description: Welcome to VizorAds. APIs for Converting Images, Products and Documents into NFT or Smart Contracts using QR codes. Ready for Web3. 
API description: Get details of your existing embed records using it's unique slug

x_rapidapi_key.description: The RapidAPI key provided for API requests.

x_rapidapi_host.description: The RapidAPI host to be used for the request.

slug.description: The unique identifier for the embed record.
